title.native: 魔法使いの嫁 西の少年と青嵐の騎士
title.romaji: Mahoutsukai no Yome: Nishi no Shounen to Seiran no Kishi
title.english: The Ancient Magus' Bride: The Boy from the West and the Knight of the Blue Storm

description:
Just prior to Chise becoming a part-time student, during Cartaphilus' brief nap… Chise receives an invitation to the academy, and she, with the help of Elias and the others, begins preparing. One such busy day, a spriggan arrives at their home on a strange horse, bringing news that "something is wrong with this Wild Hunt." Gabriel, an ordinary boy who'd just moved from London, was bored. Of his situation, of being parted from his friends, of unfamiliar land. Of everything. He was staring through his window, as if to escape from it all, when he caught a glimpse of tobacco smoke. When he ran outside to chase it, the impossible happened: his world began to intertwine with the veiled world of the mages.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: The episodes were bundled with volumes 16-18 of the manga.
synonyms: The Ancient Magus' Bride: L'enfant et le cavalier
Невеста чародея - Мальчик с запада и всадник мглы

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Monster Boy
tags.description: Prominently features a male character who is a part-monster.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/toxan_7)

**Kouhei Tokuoka** is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor and animation director.
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.

__Birthplace:__ Kushiro, Hokkaido, Japan

__[Website](http://junichimatsumoto.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/junichimatsumo4) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/junichimatsumotoof/) | [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/unichiatsumoto/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYZunc5j3EHKSbN-TwAjqGg) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%9D%BE%E6%9C%AC%E6%B7%B3%E4%B8%80)__

Junichi Matsumoto is a composer, arranger and keyboardist. He graduated from Kunitachi College of Music.

[Instagram](http://www.instagram.com/leonardosanthos) | [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/leonardosanthos) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/leonardosanthos) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@FalaCritica) | [Twitch](http://www.twitch.tv/FalaCritica)

Leonardo Santhos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and streamer.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Blitzcrank, the Great Steam Golem / Kog'Maw, The Mouth of the Abyss / Vel'Koz, the Eye of the Void / Wukong, the Monkey King (League of Legends)
- Pierce Wheels (Ben 10: Alien Force)
- Peter "Pete" Devin / Master Carter (BONDiNG)
- Agent Bratcher (Outer Banks)
- Henrich Zemo / Baron Zemo (1st voice; The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes)
- Soren (The Dragon Prince)
- Myst (Grand Chase: Dimensional Chaser)
- Spartan Jared Miller (Halo 4)
- Tetsuya Fukazawa (Ju-On: Origins)
- Kyd Miller (1st voice - 10th season; The X-Files)
- Onix (Gears of War: Judgement)
!~

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/caitlinsvoice) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/caitlinsvoice/) | [Myspace](https://myspace.com/caitlintiffany) | [Blog](https://kiristokyoto.livejournal.com/)

An American voice actor, voice director, and script writer for Funimation, New Generation Pictures, and Bang Zoom! Entertainment. She's been working in the anime industry since 2004. She grew up in the San Diego area, California, and has been married to Tony Patterson since 2009. Outside of voice acting, Caitlin has worked as an ESL teacher in Spain.

[Website](https://www.danidchambers.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/SkiniMini07) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/danidchambers/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/DaniChambersVA/)

An American actress and voice actress who currently resides in Dallas, Texas.

Originating from [Satelight](https://anilist.co/studio/41/Satelight).

_Note: Not to be confused with the other [Animator](https://anilist.co/staff/269426/Akiho-Matsui)._
